body_html: @snnn AFAIK ResourceOpKernel<T> doesn't give you enough control over how the resource is created. In particular, the Dataset constructor ops need to create an ephemeral resource in the step-local container, whereas—if I'm reading the code correctly—ResourceOpKernel<T> only creates session-scoped (or more widely shared) resources.
